title: How to send the text message send by one person to other person - Quora

response.answer_text: My text messaging app lets me copy an entire message. So, to do what you're describing, I would copy the entire original message. Then start a text to the other person with “text from ___:” then paste the original message, then send. I haven't found an easier method than that one yet.
Most SMS clients allow you to long press on a message and then select Forward from the options presented from the long press.
